original_text: When Jabin, king of Hazor, heard of this, he sent to Jobab king of Madon, and to the king of Shimron, and to the king of Achshaph,
korean_text: 하솔 왕 야빈이 이 소식을 듣고 마돈 왕 요밥과 시므론 왕과 악삽 왕과

sentences.original_text: When Jabin, king of Hazor, heard of this
sentences.korean_translation: 하솔 왕 야빈이 이 일을 들었을 때,

sentences.original_text: he sent to Jobab king of Madon
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 마돈 왕 요밥에게 사람을 보내고,

sentences.original_text: and to the king of Shimron
and to the king of Achshaph
